info.title: CDC File Adapter
info.description: Serves up CDC files, based on the URN and the type.

get.description: Accepts a urn value, and a type. Returns the requested value, or returns a 404.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: A file type, predefined. Usually something like "report" or "site-plan".

200.description: The file was found, and returned in the body of the response.

404.description: The file could not be found.

500.description: An unexpected error has occurred - please get in touch with us so we can check our logs!

get.description: Standard diagnostics method, used to test the health of the facade's underlying system.

200.description: The standard/only response from the method.
